description: The NFL now has facial authentication technology at every stadium. While it's required for credentialed workers, it's only available at a few locations for fans. We'll show you how it works for everything from buying tickets to snacks and also we'll dive into the debate over privacy concerns. NBC News' Priscilla Thompson reports.
title: Behind-the-scenes look at NFL's facial authentication technology

description: As world leaders gather in New York City for the UN General Assembly, we go behind-the-scenes for a look at the massive Secret Service mission to keep them safe.  NBC News' Tom Winter reports.
title: A behind-the-scenes look at security preps for the UN General Assembly

description: Erik Menendez is slamming Netflix’s show “Monsters: The Lyle and Erik Menendez Story,” based on the 1989 murder of Jose and Kitty Menendez, as “awful lies” and a “horrible narrative,” in a statement shared by his wife, Tammi Menendez.
title: Erik Menendez’s wife Tammi shares statement criticizing Netflix series as ‘dishonest portrayal’

description: The latest NBC News national poll shows Kamala Harris leading Donald Trump 49%-44%, within the margin of error, while Trump holds advantages on the economy, inflation and the border. NBC News National Political Correspondent Steve Kornacki breaks down the numbers on Meet the Press.
title: NBC News poll: Newly popular Harris builds momentum, challenging Trump for the mantle of change
